long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds links to full file views of Xet pointer files from Git-Xet repositories hosted on GitHub.

What if you could manage your data and models from your GitHub repository?

The XetData GitHub application enables users to add intuitive large file support to existing GitHub repositories. While the XetData application links to full file and difference views on commits and pull requests, accessing large files directly from GitHub shows an unfriendly Xet pointer file. This extension adds automatic links to large file views from within the GitHub browsing experience.

Combining the XetData GitHub application and XetData extension allows you to use GitHub as your single source of truth of project management.
